title: The Romanov Empress: A Novel of Tsarina Maria Feodorovna
description: Narrated by the mother of Russia's last tsar, this novel brings to life the courageous story of Maria Feodorovna, one of Imperial Russia's most compelling women, who witnessed the splendor and tragic downfall of the Romanovs as she fought to save her dynasty in its final years.
author: C.W. Gortner
